auth.account_verification_resent: A new verification email has been sent to the email address associated with your account
auth.account_verified_successfully: Account verified successfully, you can now log in
auth.are_you_sure_you_want_to_log_out: Are you sure you want to log out?
auth.by_clicking_you_agree_to_our: By clicking "Sign up" you agree to our
auth.password_reset_requested_msg: A new password reset email has been sent to the email address associated with your account

errors.account_not_found_msg: The account you are trying to log in to does not exist
errors.bad_request_msg: The server did not understand the request
errors.cannot_send_password_reset_email: There was an error sending the password reset email. If you don't receive an email, please request a new password reset email
errors.cannot_send_verification_email: Your account was created but there was an error sending the verification email. If you don't receive an email, please request a new verification email
errors.email_already_verified: Email address is already verified, you can now log in
errors.email_deactivated: This email address has been deactivated, it will eventually be permanently deleted
errors.email_in_use: That email address is already in use
errors.email_not_verified_msg: The email address associated with this account has not been verified, please check your inbox for a verification email or request a new one
errors.invalid_credentials_msg: The password you entered is incorrect
errors.invalid_email_msg: The email address you entered is invalid
errors.local_storage_not_available: Local storage is not available, please enable cookies to persist your session
errors.mail_not_enabled: Mail is not enabled on this server, please contact the administrator
errors.missing_token_msg: The server did not send a token. Please log in again
errors.net_err_msg: Please check your network connection and try again
errors.password_too_long: Password must be at most 64 characters
errors.password_too_short: Password must be at least 8 characters
errors.password_too_similar: Password must not be too similar to username or email
errors.password_too_weak: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number and one special character
errors.reset_password_failed: An error occurred while resetting your password
errors.username_contains_invalid_chars: Username must only contain letters, numbers, dashes, underscores and dots
errors.username_deactivated: This username has been deactivated, it will eventually be permanently deleted
errors.username_too_long: Username must be at most 32 characters
errors.username_too_short: Username must be at least 3 characters
errors.verify_email_failed: An error occurred while verifying your email address
